topics.body: So I just finished episode fifteen. And I gotta say, I'm having fun. Compared to Katanagatari's pace this series is a goddamn bullet train. The action is well animated and the robot designs and personallities are awesome.

topics.body: Sometimes I feel out of place on the thread whenever cause whenever people start talking about shit I realize I'm the most normal person here cause I don't understand 99% of the things you guys talk about when it comes to anime or such.  Someone could probably bullshit and say that one of yugioh's voice actor voices hentai or something and I wouldn't know enough about the dude to know if it's true or not.
